PAD.synopsis: The player reacts to the view of the Oubliette's bloodbath aquarium from inside the Colony kitchen.
PAD.how_to_trigger: Triggers once per nearby player by entering the voicebark trigger near the blood aquarium in the Moonrise Colony kitchen & dissection room.If the player has visited the bloodbath section of the Oubliette before, a different branch will play. To test this flow, use ReCon command "oe Oubliette_Enter" and teleport out into the Colony kitchen.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: So much blood. The illithids take what's useful and discard the rest.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: This lake of blood again. It's even bigger up close.
